column9: mason city. a funeral service will be held at 11:00 a. m. wednesday
column14: mason city. burial will be in elmwood-st. joseph cemetery
column15: mason city. visitation will be one hour prior to the service at the church. family suggests memorial contributions to the veterans of foreign wars post 733 in mason city. helen was born december 23
column17: the daughter of luloaf and hanna (sunken) kaduce in thornton. she grew up and attended school in thornton
column18: graduating from thornton high school. she married harold pint in the late 1940s. she was later united in marriage to alvin springer. he preceded her in death. later in life she married wayne caywood. helen held several positions throughout her lifetime
column19: but primarily worked in the lab at mercy medical center-north iowa. she was a loving caregiver her entire life to close relatives. helen was a member of our saviours lutheran church in mason city veterans of foreign wars post 733. she enjoyed dancing
column22: and gambling. helen is survived by a son
column23: rick (kris jones) pint of canon city
column29: and mc. kayla pint of canon city
column31: louie kaduce of meservey; special friend
column32: jerry smith of mason city; and many nieces
column34: and cousins. she was preceded in death by her parents; husbands
column43: and dora boster; and two sisters in infancy. upcoming events. visitationjun 17. 10:00 am - 11:00 am our savior's lutheran church320 west college street. albert lea
